channel.title: Glucanase on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Glucanase on COTTON

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhGLU19D

item.title: GhPdBG
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3800 Gene Symbol: GhPdBG Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The plasmodesmata-associated β-1,3-glucanase gene GhPdBG regulates fiber development in cotton.
